parsed_data.title: Implement payment gateway integration for new provider
parsed_data.description:
Integrate the new payment gateway provider to enhance payment options. Acceptance criteria: 
- API for paying customers should process payments correctly.
- Ensure security compliance.
- Documentation for integration must be completed.

comments.comment: What specific payment methods need support?
Currently integrating API endpoints.
LGTM! Just ensure the credentials are not pushed to the repo.
All tests passed, running edge case scenarios before deployment.
Deployed the payment gateway integration successfully.

parsed_data.title: Fix transaction processing error on payment page
parsed_data.description:
Users cannot complete the payment due to an internal server error. Acceptance criteria: 
- Issue should be resolved and logged.
- Users must successfully complete transactions without errors.

comments.comment: Please provide logs from the server for further investigation.
The error was identified in the payment processing method, fixing it now.
Code looks good but let's monitor the performance during testing.
Test shows that the issue is resolved, but we need to check transaction logs.
Confirmed the fix, deployed without issues.

parsed_data.title: Enhance KYC verification flow

comments.comment: Can anyone confirm what the most recent rule updates were?

parsed_data.title: Optimize payment processing times
parsed_data.description:
Reduce the average payment processing time. Acceptance criteria: 
- Target processing time reduced to under 500ms.
- Performance tests must verify the improvement.

comments.comment: Do we have baseline metrics for current processing times?

Performance improvements look good, on track for testing.

parsed_data.title: Transaction monitoring alert not triggered

parsed_data.title: Failed email notifications for payment confirmation

Users are not receiving email notifications for payment confirmations. Acceptance criteria:

Identified the issue was related to SMTP settings.
